#summary Basic description of the different types of animals supported in this release
#labels Phase-Requirements





= Dispersers =
A disperser is any animal that is currently looking for a _home range_. For this version there are 2 different ways to introduce dispersers.
  * [Breeding]
  * [Release]
  * [Movement]
  * [Foraging]
  * [HR_establishment]

= Residents =
A resident is any animal that has an established _home range_. For 
  * [Initial_residents]
  * [Mortality]
